entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7°C

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then a few showers beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. High 13. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
